introduce.name: introduce
introduce.title: What is Nano Banana Pro
introduce.label: About
introduce.description: Nano Banana Pro is an advanced AI image generation platform that turns your text descriptions into stunning, photorealistic images. Create anything you can imagine with state-of-the-art AI models.

items.title: Photorealistic Quality
items.description: Generate images with incredible detail and realism that rival professional photography.

items.title: Lightning Fast
items.description: Create high-quality images in seconds with our optimized AI infrastructure.

items.title: Easy to Use
items.description: Simply describe what you want to see, and our AI brings it to life instantly.

benefit.title: Why Choose Nano Banana Pro

benefit.description: Experience the next generation of AI image creation with unmatched quality and control.

items.title: Exceptional Image Quality

usage.name: usage
usage.title: How to Generate Images
usage.description: Create stunning AI images in simple steps:

items.title: Describe Your Vision
items.description: Type a detailed description of the image you want to create. Be specific about style, mood, and details.

items.title: Customize Settings
items.description: Choose your preferred aspect ratio, style, and quality settings to match your needs.

items.title: Generate & Refine
items.description: Click generate and watch your image come to life. Edit and iterate until it's perfect.

items.title: Download & Share
items.description: Export your creation in high resolution and use it anywhere you need.

feature.name: feature
feature.title: Powerful Features
feature.description: Everything you need to create amazing AI-generated images.

items.title: Text-to-Image
items.description: Transform any text description into stunning, high-quality images with advanced AI models.

items.title: Image Editing
items.description: Edit existing images with AI - change elements, add objects, or modify styles seamlessly.

items.title: Style Transfer
items.description: Apply artistic styles to your images or generate in specific visual aesthetics.

items.title: High Resolution
items.description: Generate images up to 4K resolution for professional use and printing.

items.title: Batch Generation
items.description: Create multiple variations of your prompt to explore different creative possibilities.

items.title: Commercial License
items.description: Use generated images for commercial projects with full rights and licensing.

faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Have another question? Contact our support team.

items.title: What is Nano Banana Pro?
items.description: Nano Banana Pro is an advanced AI image generation platform that creates high-quality, photorealistic images from text descriptions using state-of-the-art AI models.

items.title: How does the AI image generation work?
items.description: Simply describe what you want to see in text, and our AI models will generate images based on your description. You can refine and edit the results until they match your vision.

items.title: Can I use the images commercially?
items.description: Yes! Pro and Enterprise plans include commercial use licenses, allowing you to use generated images in your business, marketing materials, and products.

items.title: What image resolutions are available?
items.description: Free users get 1024x1024, Pro users get up to 2048x2048, and Enterprise users can generate images up to 4096x4096 resolution.

items.title: How many images can I generate?
items.description: Free plan includes 50 generations per month, Pro plan includes 500, and Enterprise offers unlimited generations.

items.title: Can I edit images after generation?
items.description: Yes! Our platform includes advanced editing tools to modify, refine, and perfect your generated images.
